error_details.explanation: Incorrect operand. The variable 'free_oil_changes_per_year' (value: 1) was used instead of 'paid_oil_changes_per_year' (value: 3.0).

context.question: N/A
context.flawed_solution:
#### 50
He needs to get an oil change every 3000/1000 = <<3000/1000=3>>3 months
So he gets 12/3 = <<12/3=4>>4 oil changes a year
That means he pays for 4-1 = <<4-1=3>>3 oil changes a year
So he pays 1*$50 = $<<1*50=50>>50 a year
